attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leave Motorcycles & Scooters Aloan.They are GREENER than large Executive Cars. Crush all cars over 1000cc. GO Green check out your next trip to work.How many have just the driver.

rejection.details: Please make the title of your petitition a call to action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
